nodes.bodyText: I find the original to be more readable. Spreading a not-overly-long check onto 5 lines is excessive. Also, this makes the diff harder to read.

it was over our overall line limit.
i can always push something slightly over the limit (nothing prevents me) in the interest of readability, but would that mean our limit is actually few characters higher than it is?
i don't wan to be overly principled about line length in general, but l feel breaking is justified here.
